name: The Modern Prarie Lamp
description: ELECTRIC ART!!! This fabulous one-of-a-kind lamp was made from our Garage Workshop. Our Modern Prairie Table Lamps are hand-crafted gorgeous metal table lamps. They are constructed out of pure aluminum frames and “lexan” light panels that are hand cut and “TIG welded”. The panels are frosted and can be natural or painted to cast any color into your room. They hold two standard light bulbs of any wattage (up to 100 watts) which are controlled by two separate industrial 15-amp toggle switches. These lamps are fully grounded and come with a three-prong cord for complete safety. The look is retro-modern-industrial and these welded lamps definitely live up to the look. Size is approximately 8” by 8” by 31”, but since they are custom crafted, any size is available. Thanks for stopping by!

name: The New Age Prairie Lamp
description: ELECTRIC ART!!! This fabulous one-of-a-kind lamp was made from our Garage Workshop. Our New Age Prairie Table Lamp, like its sister, the Modern Prairie, is a hand-crafted gorgeous metal table lamp. It was constructed out of pure aluminum frames and “lexan” light panels that were hand cut and “TIG welded”. The panels were frosted and painted – and we can adjust the color combination to your preferences to cast any color into your room. This lamp holds two standard light bulbs of any wattage (up to 100 watts) which are controlled by two separate industrial 15-amp toggle switches. It is fully grounded and comes with a three-prong cord for complete safety. The look is retro-modern-industrial and this welded lamp definitely adds to a room! The size is approximately 8” by 8” by 31”, but since they are custom crafted, any size is available. Thanks for stopping by!

name: City Life
description: This original art series was painted primarily with acrylics and paint markers on 6 X 6 canvases. This contemporary interpretation of city life provides colorful modern accents to your room and depicts real scenes found in the city. The small canvas size allows for interesting arrangement and placement. These five paintings are offered as a set, and include a downtown city church, a prominent city skyscraper, a child’s hand “rockin’ out!”, a young girl sticking out her tongue, and a graffiti image. Painted in a completely smoke-free environment. The copyright will not appear on the original work. Contact us directly for additional jpegs of all five pictures, along with a jpeg of the images displayed as a set. These canvases will be packed and shipped with lots of padding to assure that they arrive safely. Thanks for stopping by!

name: Tumbled Marble Series One
description: Four beautiful tumbled marble coasters to protect your gorgeous furniture from spills and watermarks! What a thoughtful and lovely gift! You receive four coasters tied with coordinating ribbon ready for giving – or keeping! These coasters are made from 4 X 4 inch tumbled marble tiles. They have been shaded with gold and copper, and the design is a deep chocolate brown. They have been varnished with professional grade artists matte varnish to protect the design, and the bottoms are finished with cork to prevent slipping.

name: Tumbled Marble Series Two
description: Four beautiful tumbled marble coasters to protect your gorgeous furniture from spills and watermarks! What a thoughtful and lovely gift! You receive four coasters tied with coordinating ribbon ready for giving – or keeping! These coasters are made from 4 X 4 inch tumbled marble tiles. The pattern is classic black, creating a strong compliment to any decor. They have been varnished with professional grade artists matte varnish to protect the design, and the bottoms are finished with cork to prevent slipping. Crafted in a 100% smoke-free environment. Thanks for stopping by!
